channel.title: railsconf2009 on Dead Programmer SOciety
channel.description: Recent content in railsconf2009 on Dead Programmer SOciety

item.title: RailsConf 2009 Program Is Looking Juicy
item.description: I just noticed that there are already a whole bunch of the approved presentations for RailsConf 2009 on up the web site here. It is looking really good already, go check it out. If you are into Ruby on Rails, you really should be going… I am!

item.title: Prepare For The RailsConf 2009 Jam Session
item.description: I will be running the music BOF at RailsConf 2009 in Las Vegas. What does that mean? We’re gonna get down. All styles will be represented, so if you have an instrument or a voice, bring it. We have a Google group started here.
